name: sonar-verification-extension-azdevops
description: An extension to check and create projects in sonarcloud. This extension is designed to help with [SonarCloud](https://sonarcloud.io/) by providing a helper task.

scripts.build: cd src && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.pack: npm run build && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json
scripts.packupversion: npm run build && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version
